derivation.yuyuan_name: late 19th cent.: from Italian, literally 'mask', from Arabic masḵ̣ara 'buffoon'

entry.def: Mascara is a substance used as make-up to make eyelashes darker.

means.word_mean: 1. makeup that is used to darken and thicken the eye lashes
